title: Family Video
summary: I've had a bunch of old reels digitzed. I'll start posting them here along with the detail I think I know. Please email/text me with any additional info you can provide. Names, dates, etc...

videos.desc: Opening shot of the Hamilton Princess Hotel. Then Olive and another couple touring the island via scooter.

timeStamps.desc: Princess Bermuda Hotel... Now named the Hamilton Princess Hotel.
Olive and another couple boarding American Airlines jet.
